amendatorysection.catchline: Reports and proceedings; how published; cost.
amendatorysection.para: Publication under sections 19-1101 and 19-1102 shall be made in one legal newspaper of general circulation in such village or city. If no legal newspaper is published in the village or city, then such publication shall be made in one legal newspaper published or of general circulation within the county in which such village or city is located. The cost of publication shall be paid out of the general funds of such village or city.
